autofocus.description: Automatically focuses the first input on page load
autofocus.description_zh: 在页面加载时自动将第一个输入聚焦

base-color.description: Sets the color of the input when it is not focused.
base-color.description_zh: 设置输入未聚焦时的颜色。

bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control’s background. Used on components that also support the color prop. - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
bg-color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件的背景。用于也支持 color 属性的组件。- 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 CSS 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

disabled.description: Removes the ability to click or target the input.
disabled.description_zh: 删除单击或定位输入的功能。

divider.description_zh: 指定项之间的分隔字符。

error.description: Puts the input in a manual error state.
error.description_zh: 将输入置于手动错误状态。

focus-all.description: Puts all inputs into a focus state when any are focused
focus-all.description_zh: 当任何输入被聚焦时，将所有输入置于焦点状态

focused.description: Force the component to use the style when focused.
focused.description_zh: 强制组件使用聚焦时的样式。

height.description: Sets the height of the component.

label.description: Sets the text of the v-label or v-field-label component.
label.description_zh: 设置 v-label 或 v-field-label 组件的文本。

loading.description: Displays linear progress bar. Can either be a String which specifies which color is applied to the progress bar (any material color or theme color - primary, secondary, success, info, warning, error) or a Boolean which uses the component color (set by color prop - if it’s supported by the component) or the primary color.
loading.description_zh: 显示线性进度条。可以是指定应用于进度条的颜色的 String（任何材质颜色或主题颜色 - 主要、次要、成功、信息、警告、错误），也可以是使用组件颜色（由 color 属性设置 - 如果组件支持）或主要颜色的布尔值。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width of the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height of the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width of the component.

:v-model.description: The value of the component v-mode. If the component supports variants, the default is an empty array.
:v-model.description_zh: 组件 v-mode 的值。如果组件支持多属性，默认为空数组。

placeholder.description_zh: 设置输入的占位符文本。

rounded.description: Applies the border-radius style to the specified component. You can get more information about this on the Corner Radius of Borders page
rounded.description_zh: 对指定的组件应用 border-radius 样式。您可以在 边框的圆角半径页面 获取更多有关信息

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

type.description_zh: 支持的类型：文本、密码、数字。

variant.type: / underlined / outlined / filled / solo / solo-inverted / solo-filled / plain
variant.description: Applies a distinct style to the component.
variant.description_zh: 对组件应用不同的样式。

width.description: Sets the width of the component.

events.name: finish
events.description: Emitted when the input is filled completely and cursor is blurred.
events.description_zh: 当输入完全填充且光标模糊时发出。

events.name: update:focused
events.description: Emitted when the input is focused or blurred
events.description_zh: 当输入聚焦或模糊时发出

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: An event that is raised when a component's model-value changes.
events.description_zh: 当组件的 model-value 更改时引发的事件。

slots.name: loader
slots.description: Slot for custom loader (displayed when loading prop is equal to true).
slots.description_zh: 自定义加载器的插槽（当加载道具等于 true 时显示）。
